title: PBE Inactivity Help?
body: I was told to write to the support about this. I have a PBE account that I haven't played in maybe 3+ months. I'm not really sure, it may have been way longer. Anyway, my PBE account has the username **[REDACTED]** Is there a possibility to have this account reactivated? Thanks.

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a PBE account associated with your live NA account. If the PBE account wasn't linked to a live account, then it was likely part of the old PBE system and deactivated as part of our migration to the new PBE system (post 2013). 

Let me know if you have any questions.
I listed the username. I played this account fairly recently, so I don't believe it had anything to do with the migration thing. How do I recover this account?
You can write a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in and one of our recovery specialists will be able to help you out. ^.^
